pages.text: Amethysts can be mined from amethyst ore found throughout the world. Once considered as precious as diamonds, there uses are now much more limited, despite their inherently magical nature. Certain Druidic crafting recipes call for them, as do some rituals.
The ore itself is found deep underground, and must be mined with the proper tools in order not to damage the amethyst.
Extremely sharp knives, suitable for Druidic purposes, can be crafted from amethysts.
Multiple amethysts can be combined into decorative blocks.
